website_summaries.verdict: Performance-driven basketball shoe. Good overall support and lightweight breathable material.
cons: Many users opted for a half size larger to fit

customer_reviews.title: Sweat thru the shoe after an hour!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 yr old son wore them to practice today. After 1 hour, He sweat right thru them and because the shoes were wet on the outside, he kept slipping and falling!! It’s almost 10 hours later and they’re still soaked. I have 2 sons and buy about 6 pairs of b-ball shoes a year, usually UA, never had this happen. I’m requesting a refund, no way could he wear these in a game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe itself, my only complaint would be the lacing on the shoe. In the middle of the curve of the shoe, the lacing sometimes gets bunched up in there and makes it difficult to tighten as you're sometimes grabbing the wrong lace. Aside from that, great shoe, and great material!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for running
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some running shoes to wear to the gym. I don't like low running shoes though. I like having something that covers my ankles and these shoes are traditional basketball type shoes. I figured I'd try them out for the gym and i love the way they fit. Extremely comfortable and i highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Rell F.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you plan to actually wear them for a basketball game! Poor quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I've now had two pairs of these shoes with the same issue. When you go to tighten the laces near the toe of the shoe the fabric loop holding the lace in place pulls out of the shoe. I had one pair replaced with 2 weeks of receiving my first pair. Once I got the replacement pair, I had the same issue again within 3 weeks. Would not recommend these shoes. Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Yohn

customer_reviews.title: They have good grip to the floor and are overall good basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This a a really great shoe and the only problem with the shoe is it is difficult for the children to get their feet into them. However once there on the boys are doing their thing on the basketball court. I actually picked them for my son’s basketball team shoes. Had no clue it would come with this minor glitch. I say minor because other than that the boys love them and I actually tried them on myself being I can fit my son’s shoes and they are quite comfortable and great for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I suggest to get half a size bigger than you think you need
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes I got them for basketball because my old ones were to small and they were just the right fit and I could’ve gotten them a little bit bigger so I could grow into them but that was my fault cuz im a girl and I didn’t know what size to get since there in men’s but it’s all good and there really good quality and they were stiff at first, I hade to break the, in but that’s how most shoes are. They also have a good arch and there really protective around the ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: Trinitey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these shoes almost daily for basketball. Very comfortable, great fit on him, and so far they are standing up to the repeated use quite well. He got them in purple and they really stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee Mason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Bought them for my cousin who plays basketball and he just loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: qevek

customer_reviews.title: This shoes runs small but it is well made.
customer_reviews.text: Nice construction. get a half size larger than you ususally wear or get them in Wide.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shineman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great show. Fits perfect. Shipped on time and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in photo
customer_reviews.text: Was a little disappointed. The shoe was not as attractive as in photo, which to be fair, happens from time to time. So was not worth the price, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Hajharry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and lasted a very long time.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe lasted a very long time with my son wearing them daily. He wore them until they started to fall apart. Good cushioning. A great basketball shoe.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: I wore it 4 times playing basketball and the plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore it 4 times playing basketball and the plastic supports on the side made my ankle bleed and the shoelace support broke. Again and I've only worn them 4 times. I will try to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Robcharlie

customer_reviews.title: bought for my Son who plays in basketball tournaments all ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my Son who plays in basketball tournaments all over the state. Loves it. I got him another pair, different colors to chose from. Price was right, they do discounts so take a look and get your deal. I caught it at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: riccle

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great basketball shoe, thought I would have to spend twice or three times as much on a player brand shoe. Very sturdy and great ankle support will buy again in the future when it wears out. I did add soles because all shoes come with cheap soles, also because I bought with intention to ball out so I needed a good sole. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: My mistake
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but Under Armour fits smaller so get a size bigger than you normally wear. I didnt know that so I had to exchange my daughters BUT I got the correct size 2 days later. It has been a wonderful experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: True customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great if need wider toe box to avoid rubbing. Very comfortable and good ankle support. Great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Let's be clear .. the shie is so comfortable .. my first under armor sneaker ... I wear a 9.5 get a 10 . Cuz I have wide feet .. looks and feel like a 9.5 the best color out . I think but if u want comfort get them ..
customer_reviews.author: Gregory burkhead

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly arch supports
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Look nice Size is perfect Cons: Even tho it has arch support it is not very sturdy. They shoes must be tied tighter than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Binkyt

customer_reviews.title: Happy 12 year old
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my sons birthday. He absolutely loves them. They fit good and look good too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eilmes

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and look
customer_reviews.text: I use these strictly to exercise. I like how they look and they are very comfortable. I've gotten compliments from total strangers in the fitness center. I have to unlace the top 3 or 4 eyelets to get my foot in then lace them back up. They fit true to size. Definitely a good purchase and would recommend them to people.
customer_reviews.author: VXP

customer_reviews.title: So good, UA will be my next sneaker as well.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of UA and I'm impressed. Many years with Nike and now realizing the foot pain was a Nike "benefit" . I won't ignore that perhaps the dynamics of my feet/body have changed . Either way the fit and comfort of these are great and the traction on outdoor courts is too. I go through a pair every 6 months . We'll see how these hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DropThe Mango

customer_reviews.title: Even a size up, it's way too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Even a size up, it's way too narrow. Hard to understand how shoes made for adults are designed for kids
customer_reviews.author: Jim Harbourne

customer_reviews.title: Good price for shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’m a weekend warrior basketball player I have played basketball all my life competitive I get up at 6:30am one day a week to go live my glory day. Had them for about 4 Month and so far they are working out. I do like how easy they are to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe right here !! very nice fit, i got it in a 12 but should of got a 12/ would of been right on the money . (Last longer i guest) i still have room In it . I give it a 5 100 Grand
customer_reviews.author: marcus mccurtis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes; however, they did start having the “stinky feet” smell after her first long practice.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovedrama

customer_reviews.title: ... these for my daughter for her bball season she love them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for her bball season she love them
customer_reviews.author: Damon Patrick Shifflett

customer_reviews.title: LoVe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Glad I could find these online since I won’t buy Nike anymore. Hard to find! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: proud momma

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks amazing, but digs into my ankle. Leaves a blister on both sides. After wearing them for a month they seem to be breaking in better.
customer_reviews.author: kevin Caravoulias

customer_reviews.title: Half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for work purposes only. I’m on my feet most of the day and so far they’re the best shoe I’ve worn. I’m a size 12 but i bought a 12.5 & they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: My friend ordered these for her grandson and he loved them. They fit just as expected and he loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: love these, want another pair, im picky but never wear anything else...im wearing them out.
customer_reviews.author: bigmill

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase ever! Fits like it was made for my husband’s feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Look great! But...
customer_reviews.text: They run small. Unfortunately for me, I got a 10 and they don't have sizes larger available in the same color so had to go for a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: My son love these shoes. May have to buy a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: CAYogi

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are quite comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are quite comfortable and look great. my only complaint about them is that there isn't anything at all on the back of them that helps you pull them onto your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Baker

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: I wear other underarmor product and love the brand. But these shoes cut the bottom on my ankles every time I play basketball in them. Wish I could send them back but I waited too long to test them out.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks better in person than is does ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks better in person than is does online, unlike most shoes I've both online. Fits me perfectly even thou it's half up.
customer_reviews.author: MEDZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13 year old son and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: treasure kish

customer_reviews.title: Works great but shoe-lace strap breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old son loved the shoes but they only lasted him 8 games. The shoe-lace straps tear out somewhat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: poorly sized
customer_reviews.text: sizes stated is too small son wears a size 12 had to return for a 13 when I got the 13 was the same as a 12 return them too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My sons basketball shoes, he likes them so i'm happy
customer_reviews.author: sKy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived fast and they were as pictured. My son wore them during basketball and they held up well.
customer_reviews.author: BennyD

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves them. The fit great! He says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Very Small and Low Toe Box
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product as the toe box was very small and not sufficiently tall enough to avoid my toes from pressing into the shoe top. Overall fit was good, e.g. length, width. And the product itself looked well made and attractive. Just didn't work for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old grandson. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: lucymae

customer_reviews.title: but so far we are happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time and fit as expected. He loves them! I can’t speak to how long they will last etc as they are fairly new, but so far we are happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right fit, just have to wear them a little to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Mike turpin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hoop shoes 👌
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new pair of kicks to hoop in and these were on time, looked great and were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely love these shoes. They are comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Consuela

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for big guys
customer_reviews.text: wide shoe, very supportive for big guys. helped me prevent a worse injury to be a light sprain. Shipping was good Recommended
customer_reviews.author: erez lewinthal

customer_reviews.title: I went half a size up. Shouldve went a whole size up
customer_reviews.text: Not made for wide feet,go one size up if wide.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were very tight when first received. After wearing them, they became more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and they were perfect! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Street ball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as expected. Probably get a couple pairs and designate one for indoor and one for outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes, great for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes, my son loves them. They are great for wide feet!! Quick shipping too
customer_reviews.author: Katie Orton

customer_reviews.title: Shopping was good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected. My daughter uses these for basketball and really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Like them because they are decently priced and they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Reagan123

customer_reviews.title: They are true to there sizing
customer_reviews.text: The are very nice .awesome very proud to wear them
customer_reviews.author: lal69

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The shoe lace eyelets started pulling out the first time these were worn.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it feels a little bit uncomfortable on the heel, otherwise very good
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin G Lamadrid

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fit fine and has good support
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit fine and has good support. However after the first use in a game the color started flaking off the toe and the logo on the ankle. Have ordered an exchange and will update this if just a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must be faulty construction
customer_reviews.text: My son used them for JV practice and games. Indoors only. They were light, comfortable, traction ok. Two eyes on the laces broke. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Team Drive 4 Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Breathable, lightweight textile upper. Full-length bootie construction with molded ankle collar for greater structure, extended support & a snug, comfortable fit. External heel counter provides additional support & keeps the back of the foot locked in place. Toe wrap improves forefoot flexibility . Durable, reinforced lace loops. Die-cut EVA sockliner provides underfoot cushioning & support. Compression molded EVA midsole carrier for lateral containment. Exposed Micro Gheel unit adds firm cushioning. 3D shank wraps up around sidewall to provide torsional rigidity & additional lateral stability. Full rubber herringbone traction pattern provides maximum floor control & grip. Weight: 13.06 oz.
feature_bullets: Full length bootie construction with molded ankle collar for greater structure, extended support & a snug, comfortable fit
External heel counter provides additional support & keeps the back of the foot locked in place
